Name: Wah-Wah
Ingredients: 45 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bittersweet and complex with hints of elderflower and grapefruit.
History: Created in 2007 at Range in San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Wah-Wah contains 206 calories
